official_title: A bill to amend the Fishermen's Protective Act.

summary.text: Amends the Fishermen's Protective Act of 1967 to prohibit the sale or transfer of a military vessel to a foreign country that has not paid in full any claim made by a vessel of the United States under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fishermen's Protective Act.
